title: Implement batching + backpressure controls in ingestion pipeline to prevent backlog blowups

sections.text: Add configurable batch sizing and concurrency limits for fetch/parse/dedupe/persist stages so ingestion throughput scales without overwhelming DB and downstream sync. Introduce backpressure based on queue depth and retry rates (e.g., slow consumers, pause/resume sources) to avoid unbounded work-item growth during large backfills. Ensure idempotency is preserved when batching and when throttling causes retries.
